sentences.en: A hardness came over Gudrun's face. She did not want to be too definite.

sentences.en: Beneath Ruth's composure he sensed an uncharacteristic hardness.

sentences.en: Hardness is caused by divalent metallic cations.

sentences.en: He felt the hardness of the iron railing press against his spine.

sentences.en: He had slipped from hardness into affability.

sentences.en: One property of steel is its hardness.

sentences.en: The hardness of this approach depends mostly on the CPU interrupt structure and context-switch hardware support.

sentences.en: The hydrogenation can be controlled to produce any degree of hardness desired in the product.

sentences.en: The old snow has compacted into the hardness of ice.

sentences.en: To get started, select a smallish brush with 100% hardness and start to paint over the duplicated layer with it.
